Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities

Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Ally, AstrologerStaff, AxeOfGodrick, Barrack, Cage, CapabilitySet, Chisui, Cliff, Club, CrabSlam, CraySlam, Dirt, Dog, DogSlam, DummyActor, Enemy, EnemyEnvironment, FingerReaderEnia, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, Floor, GatekeeperGostoc, GiantCrab, GiantCrayfish, GiantDog, GodrickSoldier, GoldenFogDoor, GoldenRune, GraftedDragon, Graveyard, GreatKnife, Grossmesser, Ground, GustOfWind, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, HuTao, Invader, Item, LoneWolf, MerchantKale, PileOfBones, Player, PuddleOfWater, RemembranceOfTheGrafted, Rune, Scimitar, ShutenDouji, SiteOfLostGrace, SkeletalBandit, SkeletalEnemy, SummonSign, Uchigatana, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Attach capability/status to the instance
    java.util.List<java.lang.Enum<?>> capabilitiesList()  
    boolean hasCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Check if this instance has capability
    void removeCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Detach capability/status from the instance
